segments.text: Hello , I really appreciate the opportunity to interview for this position .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I was wondering if you like team projects , or projects that you work on alone .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I like to work on group projects that value and need each individual ’ s contributions .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Are you most interested in a good steady job with benefits or one that will allow you to quickly advance ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I have children so a steady job is important but I would like a chance to advance .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How would you feel about relocating to another state ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I could not relocate in the next year , but might be open to it in the future .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you know how much this job offers per year ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK , well , that ’ s all I need to know for now . If something comes up , we ’ ll be contacting you .
segments.speaker: S2
